title: Rewrite storage.py to use SQLite
description: Replace JSON file operations with SQLite queries. Keep the same API interface so backend/main.py doesn't need changes.

title: Migrate storage from JSON to SQLite
description: Replace JSON file storage with SQLite for persistent storage on Railway deployment. This will allow conversations to persist across deploys.

title: Deploy to Railway
description: Set up Railway deployment with environment variables and public URL.

title: Make Phase 1 and Phase 2 sections collapsible (default collapsed)
Test SQLite migration locally
description: Verify conversations save/load correctly, test with multiple messages, ensure no data loss.

title: Configure Railway deployment settings
description: Set up Railway project, configure environment variables (OPENROUTER_API_KEY), set up build commands.

title: Create SQLite schema and database initialization
description: Define database schema for conversations and messages. Create initialization script to set up tables.
